title: Tangerine dream
creator_credit: Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television and Keri Light
brief_description: A pharmaceutical misadventure which takes place in a rainbow laundromat ends with Bonnie (Tania Lacy), and Simon (Ben Mendelsohn) speaking in visionary gibberish as they flash Bonnie’s laundry. They inhabit an indefinable world, between midnight and dawn, within the murky depths of paranoia and ambition.
